---
title: "About"
---

Prior to studying MDS at UBC, Johnson Chuang is a visual effects artist working in Vancouver. He specializes in effects (FX) and 3D camera tracking (matchmove). He has worked at studios such as Disney, Sony, Image Engine, and Digital Domain. He is credited in movies such as Moana 2, Avengers: Infinity War, Super Pets, The Maze Runner and Elysium.

He also has a background in computer science (B.Sc. from UBC and M.Sc. from SFU) with special interest in computer graphics, visualization, algorithms and data structures.
